name: Money Mafia
description:
Take on the role of Tony "Two Cents" Ricci and defend your family's laundromat from a mob of unruly gangsters in classic 1930's mobster fashion!

WASD - movement
CLICK - shoot
E - discard weapon
R - restart

Ammo is finite, so be careful with your bullets! You will have to pick up new guns when you are out of ammo.
